name: FNF - Sonic's Rythm Rush Skin Demo
name_original: FNF - Sonic's Rythm Rush Skin Demo
description:
Sonic the Hedgehog skin over BF! Now with Pixel and Christmas week sprites!

Tails over GF of all characters is weird but instead of have sonic rap battling over a love interest, it'd be cool for him to have a sorta hype man carryin the speakers.

Knuckles over Daddy Dearest, (most fitting and I not a lot of Knuckles mods for this game)

Shadow over Pico, (grungy, say swears, gun weilding y'know)

Nothin much else to say, enjoy the mod!
